headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  WEINRIB, JEROME THE MEMBERS OF BRAE BURN COUNTRY CLUB MOURN THE PASSING OF OUR ESTEEMED MEMBER JEROME WEINRIB. OUR SYMPATHY IS EXTENDED TO HIS ENTIRE FAMILY. PAUL FRIEDMAN, PRESIDENT DOUG SIMON, M.D., SECRETARY 1

keywords.value: WEINRIB, JEROME THE MEMBERS OF BRAE BURN COUNTRY CLUB MOURN THE PASSING OF OUR ESTEEMED MEMBER JEROME WEINRIB. OUR SYMPATHY IS EXTENDED TO HIS ENTIRE FAMILY. PAUL FRIEDMAN, PRESIDENT DOUG SIMON, M.D., SECRETARY 1
keywords.name: persons

snippet: WEINRIB--Jerome The members of Brae Burn Country Club mourn the passing of our esteemed member Jerome Weinrib. Our sympathy is extended to his entire family. Paul Friedman, President Doug Simon, M.D., Secretary 1
lead_paragraph: WEINRIB--Jerome The members of Brae Burn Country Club mourn the passing of our esteemed member Jerome Weinrib. Our sympathy is extended to his entire family. Paul Friedman, President Doug Simon, M.D., Secretary 1
